com.deltadna.android.sdk.ads

Class InterstitialAd

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deltadna.android.sdk.ads.Ad
      • com.deltadna.android.sdk.ads.InterstitialAd

  • public final class InterstitialAd
extends Ad
    Class for creating and showing an interstitial ad.

    The ad can be created through one of the static create helpers, from an Engagement.

    The ad can be shown through show().

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.deltadna.android.sdk.ads.Ad

        engagement

      • create

        @Nullable
public static InterstitialAd create()
        Creates an interstitial ad.

        null may be returned in case the ad is now allowed to show (ie too many ads shown during the session).

        Returns:
        the interstitial ad, or null

      • create

        @Nullable
public static InterstitialAd create(@Nullable
                                              InterstitialAdsListener listener)
        Creates an interstitial ad.

        null may be returned in case the ad is now allowed to show (ie too many ads shown during the session).

        Parameters:
        listener - the listener for events within the ad lifecycle, may be null
        Returns:
        the interstitial ad, or null

      • create

        @Nullable
public static InterstitialAd create(com.deltadna.android.sdk.Engagement engagement)
        Creates an interstitial ad from an Engagement once it has been populated with response data after a successful request.

        null may be returned in case the Engagement was not set-up to show an interstitial ad.

        Parameters:
        engagement - the Engagement with response data
        Returns:
        the interstitial ad created from engagement, else null

      • create

        @Nullable
public static InterstitialAd create(@Nullable
                                              com.deltadna.android.sdk.Engagement engagement,
                                              @Nullable
                                              InterstitialAdsListener listener)
        Creates an interstitial ad from an Engagement once it has been populated with response data after a successful request.

        null may be returned in case the Engagement was not set-up to show an ad, or the ad is now allowed to show (ie too many ads shown during the session).

        Parameters:
        engagement - the Engagement with response data
        listener - the listener for events within the ad lifecycle, may be null
        Returns:
        the interstitial ad created from engagement, else null
